snippet: Officials noted that in none of the three bombings on Friday, scattered across Kabul, did the insurgents manage to breach their targets’ inner defenses.
abstract: Afghan officials congratulate security forces’ handling of three major Taliban-led bombings occurring within less than 24-hours, saying it proves training is working; military experts and former government officials say there continue to be shortcomings in ability to protect civilians and this is demonstrated by Taliban’s ability to carry out multiple assaults simultaneously despite fractured leadership.

byline.contributor: Jawad Sukhanyar, Ahmad Shakib and Fazal Muzhary contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Officials noted that in none of the three bombings on Friday, scattered across Kabul, did the insurgents manage to breach their targets’ inner defenses.

headline.main: In Handling Barrage of Attacks, Afghan Forces Show Training Is Paying Off
headline.print_headline: In Handling Barrage of Attacks, Afghan Forces Show Training Is Paying Off
